verses.verse: And it came to pass<WH4428>, when all the kings that were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383>, in the hill-country<WH2022>, and in the lowland<WH8219>, and on all the shore<WH2348> of the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> in front<WH4136> of Lebanon<WH3844>, the Hittite<WH2850>, and the Amorite<WH567>, the Canaanite<WH3669>, the Perizzite<WH6522>, the Hivite<WH2340>, and the Jebusite<WH2983>, heard thereof<WH8085>;
that they gathered<WH6908> themselves together<WH3162>, to fight<WH3898> with Joshua<WH3091> and with Israel<WH3478>, with one<WH259> accord<WH6310>.
But when the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gibeon<WH1391> heard<WH8085> what Joshua<WH3091> had done<WH6213> unto Jericho<WH3405> and to Ai<WH5857>,

they also did work<WH6213> wilily<WH6195>, and went<WH3212> and made as if they had been ambassadors<WH6737>, and took<WH3947> old<WH1087> sacks<WH8242> upon their asses<WH2543>, and wine<WH3196> - skins<WH4997>, old<WH1087> and rent<WH1234> and bound up<WH6887>,

and old<WH1087> and patched<WH2921> shoes<WH5275> upon their feet<WH7272>, and old<WH1087> garments<WH8008> upon them<WH3899>; and all the bread of their provision<WH6718> was dry<WH3001> and was become mouldy<WH5350>.

And they went<WH3212> to Joshua<WH3091> unto the camp<WH4264> at Gilgal<WH1537>, and said<WH559> unto him<WH376>, and to the men of Israel<WH3478>, We are come<WH935> from a far<WH7350> country<WH776>: now therefore make<WH3772> ye a covenant with us<WH1285>.
And the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> unto the Hivites<WH2340>, Peradventure<WH194> ye dwell<WH3427> among<WH7130> us<WH3772>; and how shall we make a covenant with you<WH1285>?
And they said<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091>, We are thy servants<WH5650>. And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto them<WH370>, Who are ye? and from whence come ye<WH935>?

And they said<WH559> unto him<WH3966>, From a very far<WH7350> country<WH776> thy servants<WH5650> are come<WH935> because of the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>: for we have heard<WH8085> the fame<WH8089> of him<WH6213>, and all that he did in Egypt<WH4714>,

and all that he did<WH6213> to the two<WH8147> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, that were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383>, to Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon<WH2809>, and to Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan<WH1316>, who was at Ashtaroth<WH6252>.

And our elders<WH2205> and all the inhabitants<WH3427> of our country<WH776> spake<WH559> to us<WH559>, saying, Take<WH3947> provision<WH6720> in your<WH3027> hand for the journey<WH1870>, and go<WH3212> to meet<WH7125> them<WH559>, and say unto them<WH5650>, We are your servants: and now make<WH3772> ye a covenant with us<WH1285>.

This our bread<WH3899> we took hot<WH2525> for our provision<WH6679> out of our houses<WH1004> on the day<WH3117> we came forth<WH3318> to go<WH3212> unto you<WH3001>; but now, behold, it is dry, and is become mouldy<WH5350>:

and these wine<WH3196> - skins<WH4997>, which we filled<WH4390>, were new<WH2319>; and<WH1234>, behold, they are rent: and these our garments<WH8008> and our shoes<WH5275> are become old<WH1086> by reason of the very<WH3966> long<WH7230> journey<WH1870>.
And the men<WH582> took<WH3947> of their provision<WH6718>, and asked<WH7592> not counsel at the mouth<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

And Joshua<WH3091> made<WH6213> peace<WH7965> with them<WH3772>, and made a covenant<WH1285> with them<WH2421>, to let them live: and the princes<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> sware unto them<WH7650>.

And it came to pass at the end<WH7097> of three<WH7969> days<WH3117> after<WH310> they had made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with them<WH8085>, that they heard that they were their neighbors<WH7138>, and that they dwelt<WH3427> among them<WH7130>.

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> journeyed<WH5265>, and came<WH935> unto their cities<WH5892> on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117>. Now their cities<WH5892> were Gibeon<WH1391>, and Chephirah<WH3716>, and Beeroth<WH881>, and Kiriath-jearim<WH7157>.

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> smote<WH5221> them not<WH5387>, because the princes of the congregation<WH5712> had sworn<WH7650> unto them by Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>. And all the congregation<WH5712> murmured<WH3885> against the princes<WH5387>.

But all the princes<WH5387> said<WH559> unto all the congregation<WH5712>, We have sworn<WH7650> unto them by Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>: now therefore we may<WH3201> not touch them<WH5060>.
This we will do<WH6213> to them<WH2421>, and let them live; lest wrath<WH7110> be upon us<WH7621>, because of the oath which we sware unto them<WH7650>.

And the princes<WH5387> said<WH559> unto them<WH2421>, Let them live: so they became hewers<WH2404> of wood<WH6086> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> unto all the congregation<WH5712>, as the princes<WH5387> had spoken unto them<WH1696>.

And Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for them<WH1696>, and he spake unto them<WH559>, saying, Wherefore have ye beguiled<WH7411> us<WH559>, saying, We are very<WH3966> far<WH7350> from you<WH3427>; when ye dwell among us<WH7130>?

Now therefore ye are cursed<WH779>, and there shall never fail<WH3772> to be of you bondmen<WH5650>, both hewers<WH2404> of wood<WH6086> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> for the house<WH1004> of my God<WH430>.

And they answered<WH6030> Joshua<WH3091>, and said<WH559>, Because it was certainly<WH5046> told<WH5046> thy servants<WH5650>, how that Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> his servant<WH5650> Moses<WH4872> to give<WH5414> you all the land<WH776>, and to destroy<WH8045> all the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> from before<WH6440> you<WH3966>; therefore we were sore afraid<WH3372> for our lives<WH5315> because<WH6440> of you<WH6213>, and have done this thing<WH1697>.
And now<WH2009>, behold, we are in thy hand<WH3027>: as it seemeth<WH5869> good<WH2896> and right<WH3477> unto thee to do<WH6213> unto us<WH6213>, do.
And so did<WH6213> he unto them<WH5337>, and delivered them out of the hand<WH3027> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, that they slew them not<WH2026>.

And Joshua<WH3091> made<WH5414> them that day<WH3117> hewers<WH2404> of wood<WH6086> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> for the congregation<WH5712>, and for the altar<WH4196> of Jehovah<WH3068>, unto this day<WH3117>, in the place<WH4725> which he should choose<WH977>.
